title: Grisha // Portfolio
description: First-generation cognitive cyberware for education, medicine, and art

author.name: Grisha Szep
author.about: Researcher at the Henkaku Center, Chiba Institute of Technology. PhD via Microsoft Research Cambridge, with a decade spanning immunology, synthetic biology, quantum computing, and GPU-accelerated simulation. Now building cognitive cyberware for educators, clinicians, and creatives.
